description: Fix issue where literal value for ``--website-redirect`` was not being used. (`issue 1137 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/1137>`__)
Fix issue with the processing of the ``--queue-url`` parameter (`issue 1126 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/issues/1126>`__)
Add support for config variable for changing S3 runtime values (`issue 1122 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/1122>`__)
Fix issue with SSL certificate validation when using proxies and python 2.7.9 (`botocore issue 451 <https://github.com/boto/botocore/pull/451>`__)
